languages.text: {n}Фелек безразлично пожимает плечами.{/n} "На то они и безумцы. Вы ведь не станете внимать бредням челяди, посмевшей поднять руку на благородную кровь?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Фелек безразлично пожимает плечами.{/n} "На то они и безумцы. Вы ведь не станете внимать бредням челяди, посмевшей поднять руку на благородную кровь?"

languages.text: {n}Felek gives an indifferent shrug.{/n} "That's why they are insane. Will you really heed the ramblings of retainers who dared to raise their hand against the scions of a noble bloodline?"
languages.original_text: {n}Фелек безразлично пожимает плечами.{/n} "На то они и безумцы. Вы ведь не станете внимать бредням челяди, посмевшей поднять руку на благородную кровь?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Felek gives an impassionate shrug.{/n} "That's why they are insane. Will you heed the ramblings of the retainers who dared to raise their hand against the scions of noble blood?"
{n}Felek gives an impassionate shrug.{/n} "That's why they are insane. Will you heed the ramblings of the retainers who dared to raise their hand against the scions of noble blood?"
{n}Felek gives an impassioned shrug.{/n} "That's why they are insane. Will you really heed the ramblings of retainers who dared to raise their hand against the scions of a noble bloodline?"

{n}Felek gives an indifferent shrug.{/n} "That's why they are insane. Will you really heed the ramblings of retainers who dared to raise their hand against the scions of a noble bloodline?"
{n}Felek gives an indifferent shrug.{/n} "That's why they are insane. Will you really heed the ramblings of retainers who dared to raise their hand against the scions of a noble bloodline?"

languages.text: {n}Felek se encoge de hombros con indiferencia.{/n} «Por eso están locos. ¿Va a hacer caso a las divagaciones de unos criados que se atrevieron a enfrentarse a los descendientes de un noble linaje?».
languages.original_text: {n}Felek gives an indifferent shrug.{/n} "That's why they are insane. Will you really heed the ramblings of retainers who dared to raise their hand against the scions of a noble bloodline?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Felek se encoge de hombros con indiferencia.{/n} «Por eso están locos. ¿Va a hacer caso a las divagaciones de unos criados que se atrevieron a enfrentarse a los descendientes de un noble linaje?».

languages.text: {n}Felek zuckt gleichgültig mit den Schultern.{/n} "Deswegen sind sie wahnsinnig. Werdet Ihr wirklich auf das wirre Gerede von Vasallen hören, die ihre Hand gegen die Sprösslinge eines Adelsgeschlechts erhoben haben?"
languages.original_text: {n}Felek gives an indifferent shrug.{/n} "That's why they are insane. Will you really heed the ramblings of retainers who dared to raise their hand against the scions of a noble bloodline?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Felek zuckt gleichgültig mit den Schultern.{/n} "Deswegen sind sie wahnsinnig. Werdet Ihr wirklich auf das wirre Gerede von Vasallen hören, die ihre Hand gegen die Sprösslinge eines Adelsgeschlechts erhoben haben?"

languages.text: {n}Felek hausse les épaules avec indifférence.{/n} « C'est bien pour ça qu'ils sont fous. Allez-vous vraiment écouter les élucubrations de domestiques ayant osé s'en prendre aux héritiers d'une noble lignée ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Felek gives an indifferent shrug.{/n} "That's why they are insane. Will you really heed the ramblings of retainers who dared to raise their hand against the scions of a noble bloodline?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Felek hausse les épaules avec indifférence.{/n} « C'est bien pour ça qu'ils sont fous. Allez-vous vraiment écouter les élucubrations de domestiques ayant osé s'en prendre aux héritiers d'une noble lignée ? »

languages.text: {n}费雷克冷漠地耸了耸肩。{/n}“所以他们才是疯子。这群乱臣贼子竟敢举起武器，攻击两个高贵王朝的后人。您真的会相信那群人的胡言乱语吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Felek gives an indifferent shrug.{/n} "That's why they are insane. Will you really heed the ramblings of retainers who dared to raise their hand against the scions of a noble bloodline?"

traits.locale_text: {n}费雷克愤怒地耸了耸肩。{/n}“所以他们才是疯子。这群乱臣贼子竟敢举起武器，攻击两个高贵王朝的后人。您真的会相信那群人的胡言乱语吗？”

languages.text: {n}フェレックは無関心に肩をすくめる。{/n}「だから奴らは狂っているんだ。高貴な血筋の後継者に、恐れ多くも手を出した家臣達の戯言に本当に耳を貸すのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Felek gives an indifferent shrug.{/n} "That's why they are insane. Will you really heed the ramblings of retainers who dared to raise their hand against the scions of a noble bloodline?"

traits.locale_text: {n}フェレックは大袈裟に肩をすくめる。{/n}「だから奴らは狂っているんだ。高貴な血筋の後継者に、恐れ多くも手を出した家臣達の戯言に本当に耳を貸すのか？」
{n}フェレックは無関心に肩をすくめる。{/n}「だから奴らは狂っているんだ。高貴な血筋の後継者に、恐れ多くも手を出した家臣達の戯言に本当に耳を貸すのか？」

languages.text: {n}Felek, umursamazca omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Deli işte, sen onlara ne bakıyorsun? Damarlarında asil kan taşıyana el kaldırmaya cüret eden uşakların zırvasıyla mı iş yapacaksın?"
languages.original_text: {n}Felek gives an indifferent shrug.{/n} "That's why they are insane. Will you really heed the ramblings of retainers who dared to raise their hand against the scions of a noble bloodline?"
